评论概述: The perfect pair, a review of comfortable and stylish pants
评论详情: In the realm of fashion, the quest for the perfect pair of pants is often akin to searching for a needle in a haystack. With countless styles, materials, and fits available, it can be a daunting task to find a pair that meets all of one’s criteria for comfort, style, and functionality. However, I recently discovered a pair of pants that not only fit me perfectly but also exceed my expectations in terms of comfort and design. Standing at 5'8’ I have often struggled to find clothing that fits my frame without compromising on style or comfort. Yet, these pants, which I purchased in a Large, have proven to be a game-changer.  From the moment I slipped into these pants, I was struck by how well they fit. The combination of a well-designed waistband and a comfortable stretch fabric creates a silhouette that flatters my figure without feeling restrictive. The waistband is notably chunky and features a drawstring; although I find that I do not need to tighten it, the option is there for those who prefer a more customized fit. This thoughtful design element enhances the overall comfort of the pants, allowing for ease of movement throughout the day.  One of the standout features of these pants is their length. As someone who often finds that pants are either too long or too short, I was pleasantly surprised by how perfectly these fit my height. The length is on point, striking a balance that allows for both style and practicality. Additionally, the positioning of the pockets is well-considered, laying flat against the fabric without adding bulk. The subtle detail above the back pockets adds a touch of flair, ensuring that the pants are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing.  The material of these pants is another aspect worth noting. Made from a windbreaker-like fabric, they offer a unique combination of durability and breathability. I had the opportunity to wear them on a particularly hot day, and I was impressed by how well they managed to keep me cool. The breathability of the material allows for air circulation, making them suitable for various weather conditions—a quality that is often hard to come by in stylish pants.  In summary, these pants have quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. Their perfect fit, comfortable fabric, and thoughtful design features make them a versatile choice for any occasion. Whether paired with a casual tee for a laid-back outing or dressed up with a stylish blouse, these pants effortlessly transition from day to night. I wholeheartedly recommend that anyone in search of the ideal pair of pants consider adding these to their collection. They have certainly elevated my style and comfort, proving that the right pair of pants can indeed make all the difference.

Amazing, comfortable, and versatile.  I appreciate advice to size up - ordered a medium (usually wear small in CRZ) and fit is perfect!  I am 5’6 and 120#.  Length hits at ankles.  Nice waistband, seams and pocket with hidden compartment.  Super in every way, esp the value considering similar brands far more expensive.  Will order in other colors!

Ladies...these are it.  They fit me so perfectly.  They are extremely comfortable with a nice stretch.  I love the waist band, it's kind of chunky and has a drawstring, although I don't need to use it because I like how they feel without tightening them.The length is on point.  I am 5'2 and got an XS.  I honestly have never had a pair of pants in this material fit so well.  I like how the pockets lay and the little detail above your butt falls nicely.They are like a windbreaker material.  I had them on the other day and it was extremely hot and they were pretty breathable.I am super excited about these pants and highly recommend you get yourself a pair!

I bought these in gray and absolutely love them. They are so soft and fit well. I bought the same size and style in navy and they are too short and tight. I want to try again, and just hope they fit like the gray ones.

I didn’t have high hopes, but I’ve got to say, I LOVE these pants! They are much like the $100 brand name joggers, buttery soft, great fit, look great, but at a reasonable price. Do size up 1 size. I normally wear a M and I sized up to L and they fit perfectly. I love them so much I’ve purchased 3 pairs - black, navy and dark forest green.

评论概述: Nice, but you may want to size up. Re  Ink Grey: It’s dark
评论详情: I ordered up based on the measurements in the size chart. I am technically between two sizes. I think they fit okay. The fabric seems nice, and there are two pockets and a small pocket for a key or cash inside one of those pockets. The price is about the same as some I bought during the pandemic at another store. These come in many colors, and I ordered the wrong one. The Ink Grey is more of an off-black. I am going to return them, but I ordered the Mysterious Grey and the True Navy. I think they have four different greys and at least two shades of blue, so color is not a problem with these.

评论概述: Love the texture and stretchiness of the fabric
评论详情: Super soft and stretchy, pocket size is perfect. Love the cuffs at the bottom of the pant. Got a size up and would definitely recommend as it is still on the snug side. It feels just like tight leggings but is thicker material. Got black so it goes with anything. Super comfortable to wear when doing anything.
Love the pants the color the style BUT the material is weird it’s like slippery they keep falling Im gonna have to keep them because i removed the tags

评论概述: Love, but look at sizing chart
评论详情: I’m 120 5’2 1/2” and I got a size small and packed them for a trip and realized too late they were quite large on me. I loved the feel and style so I ordered an xs and they fit like a dream! Definitely plan on ordering more!
Honestly my favorite pair I’ve ordered from Amazon!

评论概述: Wear all the time during pregnancy
评论详情: Nice and comfy

I love these freakin’ pants.  They look great on me and are so comfortable.  I just bought another pair.  I love everything about them but two things that were a little unexpected which you should know are that (1) they don’t come down quite as far on the calves as shown in the picture (but not much higher - it’s cuter actually) and (2) the material is a little bit unusual - my son said it feels like a swimsuit and he’s right - they are very soft to the touch - but not in a bad way.  It’s not like a swimsuit at all but it is unusual. I like the softness of it a lot.About the size - I am 5’8” and 145 lbs and I bought a L which fits me perfectly.  I usually wear sizes 8/10 so if I had followed the sizing guide I would have gotten a medium.  Glad I did not.
These are so perfect! They will quickly be a staple in my wardrobe.
The fit is perfect!! I absolutely love these!! True to size.

评论概述: Love the style, fabric and quality.
评论详情: I love the style, somewhere in between pants and joggers. Fabric is great not thin or too thick.. the quality will not disappoint. Casual but can be dressed up or worn to the office. Wash well and no ironing needed. The photos looks like there are cuffs at the ankle. The pants are actually straight. True to size for me. 5’5” 128lbs.
Quality is really nice, but you may need to size up once or twice in sizes. I got my normal size and it looked like leggings with a drawstring as opposed to joggers.
I liked the fabric, but I didn't like they way they fit me. Designed for someone that is smaller than me.

These pants are very comfortable and look nice enough to match a lot of casual clothes. They're great to wear at home all day, too. I bought two pairs in different colors (black and grey) and I like them both. I wore them multiple times in my trip to Japan recently, and was very happy with the purchases.
So comfortable

I’m loving these joggers and wearing on repeat! They wash fantastically, no shrinkage or pilling. Not see through, they retain their shape and the fabric does have some stretch while retaining their structure but very the course of daily wear. Very comfortable style. I purchased the black color, will definitely purchase more colors.

评论概述: If you are a 23” - 24” waist in jeans - xxs will fit.
评论详情: This company is a blessing if you are very petite and struggle to find things that fit in women’s regular sizing.  The quality is comparable to Lululemon at a fraction of the price. Don’t hesitate!
These exceeded my expectations! They’re incredibly comfortable and versatile. I wore them on a long plane ride and while walking around town—perfect fit, pockets, and so comfortable.
Love these joggers! So comfy. Fit great. High quality. One of my favorite pants.
That are so light cute and comfortable and eh- mmm exactly like another very popular brand that charges 3x more!! Shhh love my CRZ yoga!!!
They fit so well. Size M, 5'6" and 160lbs. They have very nice fabric and wash so well even if you dry them.

Was looking for a pair of joggers to wear on the beach or after a paddle that would not break the bank. Love the comfort of these joggers. Have not washed them yet. I am wearing size M - usually gap M and ann taylor/Loft size 8 bottoms or lulu size 10 bottoms.  Super cute for the price!  Win win.
This ran small for me. Fabric was very lightweight and super comfortable, just was smaller than I preferred.

I am a HUGE fan of these pants. They are my go-to pants for travel and everyday adventures and I can always count on them to make my legs look slim. Super sleek, moisture wicking material, comparable to Lululemon for like 1/3 the price! I have a pair of black and gray sage and recently got my second pair of black cause I got paint on my first pair and I wear it so much that I had to replace it! Holds up to washing very well too! If it wasnt for the paint would be as good as new after 2 years!

评论概述: Literally the best pants I own
评论详情: These pants are the best. I’m 5’3”, 150lbs, and the size medium were perfect. I got them in black. The pockets are deep and hold an iPhone. The stretchy waistband holds its shape. The material doesn’t make me sweat, but it’s not too thin. And trust me, these pants are toddler and infant proof. They look high quality, and I feel comfortable wearing them out places. Definitely not baggy or frumpy like other popular brands of joggers. The material and style is Lulu🍋 for less!!
These pants are amazing. Super soft and stretchy. Perfect rise in the waist and good pocket size.
Extremely comfortable that I would rank up there with Lululemon.  They're perfect for lunging around the house or running errands around town. . . and of course, working out
Love the sweat pants and the color

I am 5'6" size 2 and it's hard to find joggers that are both long enough and slim enough in the leg.  These are perfect!!  They hit just at the ankle and they're not too baggy.  And bonus, they're comfortable, the fabric is stretchy and lightweight.  I hope they make this exact same style in a slightly warmer fabric for the winter.

评论概述: Beautiful fit, slim legs, comfortable, and not bunchy at the waist
评论详情: Very happy I found these, for the reasons in the headline! Will get a second pair. Like this off-white color

These are really awesome. Slightly short for me at 5'8" but I don't even care. The material is awesome - light, doesn't collect pet hair, doesn't get knee marks that stay stretched when you're standing and not see through. For me, they're the perfect width - not too wide but not skin tight. Also, a lot of joggers tend to taper in on the waist, and these don't as much, which I like. Overall I will be buying more colors and I do recommend them!
Great fit and style for casual wear. The fabric is good quality—thick and smoothing. I’ll wear these for travel days or casual around town.

评论概述: A bit long for shorter person
评论详情: The pants are made of a nice material. I think of Lululemon pants when I wear these. The inseam is a bit too long for me (5'2"), and if you don't mind the pants bunching a little at the ankle, then they're fine.  I haven't decided if I am keeping them due to the length. On the other hand, the material is nice.
I love these joggers! Great material.  Washed well.  Very flattering fit.  I’m usually a medium but went up to a large based on reviews and they fit perfect.  Comfortable and light weight.

These were delivered today and I tried them on immediately. These may just be my new favorite pant. I also think I can get away with dressing them up for work, bonus! Fit great, feel great, and doesn't make a distracting swooshing sounds for those of us girls who's thighs rub together 😉 I am 5'6" and about 160lbs and ordered a size large for reference.
The material and fit on these are top notch! Super cozy! The fit and fabric make them easy to dress up to into a casual cute outfit or dress down and wear to the gym!
My daughter is tiny with a very thin waist but long legs. The XXS fits great. And the shade of navy is nice. It’s a deep navy color. Overall, very satisfied!

I am 5 4 and about 140lbs with an athletic build. I purchased a size medium and they sit amazingly. Love how flattering they look. Very comfy and stretchy as well. you can dress them up to wear them to work or just wear them around the house when cleaning.  beautiful coloring. Ive also put them through the washer and dryer and they didn't shrink or pull.  If you are considering buying Id say go ahead and push buy... you won't regret it.  These have become a staple product in my closet.
Fabric is so comfortable. However I’m 5’10, size 10 and got a large. It felt a little too tight and were too short so had to return

Size reference: 5’2”, 145#, Apple shape, longer torso. Typically wear size M or PM  Ordered size M, black.  They fit true to size and seem well made, easy care, easy wear. I’m not used to fabrics that don’t contain at least a little cotton so I’m adjusting to the feel of the fabric. But it is soft to the touch and comfortable.  The pockets are nice—not overly deep nor shallow. I wish there were back pockets, too, but only because they tend to make my butt look better. LOL!  These are nice joggers that would make great travel pants and they look polished, not sloppy. I’d buy them again.

I was searching for some pants that weren’t leggings but also weren’t sweats. And these are the perfect in between. I was also looking for something that doesn’t collect dog hair as I have 3 dogs and these just simply wipe off the dog hair. You can actually breathe and move in these. All while still looking somewhat put together! They are very nicely made! Highly recommend these.

These are so comfy. I’ve worn them multiple days in a row since I got them. I don’t want to wear any other pants! I first purchased the halara joggers off TikTok shop and those had a tight band around my belly that I didn’t love so I returned those and came to Amazon and found these. Highly recommend! The perfect joggers
These are so soft & look so sleek! Super comfy & a perfect dupe for you-know-who-Lu. I’d say runs true to size. I’m 5’5” & they hit right at the ankle.
Don’t get me wrong i absolutely love these but be careful when washing would suggest tying the strings. Wish i could get a new pair 😔

评论概述: Lightweight and Doesn't Make Sound When Walking
评论详情: Love these joggers and have them in two colors so far.  These are more athleisure wear as opposed to workout wear, in my opinion. The material is great and doesn't attract lint or pet hair.  They do not make the swish sound when you walk either (unlike their Active joggers).  I am 5'3 for reference and would not hesitate to purchase more of these joggers.
So cool that they offer size XXS. It can be hard to find clothes that fits and these do! Nice soft fabric, comfortable and good pockets
These are a good length for the shorter girls. I have worn them for the day and working out.

I’ve repurchased these joggers twice because I love them so much!!!! They’re comfy and just the right amount of stretch - don’t stretch out but they’re stretch material if that makes sense! 10/10 I wear these ALL THE TIME
Have now bought in 2 colors and will buy a 3rd pair - have told all my friends to buy these!

评论概述: Best Travel and Hiking Pants Ever
评论详情: These pants were absolutely the best pants ever to travel and hike with. I climbed the Great Wall of China with them. Only wish the pockets were a zipped to secure your passport.
I don’t leave many reviews but these are exceptionally comfortable! I don’t know how they will last but the wear is incredible. I sized up for a looser fit and ordering another pair now.
Product was pretty much perfect! I got them for my girlfriend and she loved them! Plan on getting more!

These are flattering and very comfortable!  Very nice quality! Good Value!  !  These joggers for ladies are far more flattering fitting than the Athleta and Lululemon joggers I have tried.  These from Amazon, do not have extra bulky looking material in the hip region. Thus, a much more flattering look compared to other joggers.  I just ordered in more colors after receiving my first pair.  Material is not for really cold days, but perfect for above 40 degree days.  At 5’9” & 126 Lbs., the small fits well.  Wish they were a little longer in the leg length.  Since these days, all lengths of pants are in style, it is fine.
Love these joggers. So soft and comfy. Great to dress up or down

These pants are amazing! They don't wrinkle, they're super flattering, extremely comfortable, and they wash up well. I've worn them as regular outfit pants, and I've used them for flying. I have them in two different colors, and they do fit slightly differently (the melanite pair was longer than the smoky blue), but both still fit. I'm 5'3" and 120 lbs, and the length of the small is perfect for me. I still think they would look very cute on someone taller as well. I cannot recommend these pants enough (and I've already shared the link with friends and family who agree!).
I read some of the comments and went up a size. I got an extra large and they fit perfectly. I will definitely buy these again. I’m 5.5 and they stop right above my ankles.
These things are amazing for traveling. Kept my legs warm on a long flight, yet cool enough when you get off the plane that you are not sweating!
I was really pleased with these! Comfortable and cute! I ordered both a small and xsmall to be sure and I kept the small (I’m 5’6, 125lbs). Will definitely order in another color.
I like these joggers.  They kinda look like business casual but then again I might be on the way to the gym. I'm 5'4" and 130ish lbs. Size small is on the bigger size. Will buy more colors.
I wasn’t really a fan of the material. It’s more like a slick type of material feel or maybe a nylon feel, but I didn’t like it.

Great dupes for bigger brands. Super soft and wash well! The length is great and the fabric is really good quality. My sister bought a pair first, then I bought mine, and my older sister bought hers. I need them in every color!  Functioning drawstring!

I have three pairs of these in black, navy, and russet. They’re super comfortable, keep their shape, and are super flattering and don’t look frumpy. They also have good sized pockets! I originally bought them to play disc golf in, because I wanted something more substantial than leggings for cooler days, but I’ve been wearing them casually as well. They are slim fitting, just FYI if you’re looking for a baggier jogger. I’m 5”1’ and 110lbs and bought an xxsmall. They are just an inch shorter than I would like, but are perfect in every other way.

Soft fabric but it shrinks with every wash.  So buy the longer length I suppose?  I follow this influencer who claimed they are like Lululemon Aligns and I am sorry but it is not as soft and buttery.  It rolls on the stomach area too.

评论概述: Nice Pants Overall but Sizing Varies
评论详情: These are very comfortable joggers in a nicer material that makes them versatile for casual or a dressier look. The best part is that dog hair does not stick to them! Unfortunately I bought a second pair in another color in the same size and the were a bit too small and I ended up returning that one. First pair is going strong though, they wash really well in the washer and don't show any signs of wear despite being worn and washed several times.
Cute but I think the waist to thigh ratio is tough. One wash and they shrink up.

I bought 5 pairs of these and the first time I washed them the eyelets on the string came off on 3 of the pairs. It causes the whole string to unravel and fray in the waist band. Now the waist band is all bumpy so unless I wear it with a baggy shirt they look funny.

评论概述: Is this brand small for everyone?
评论详情: I ordered these in my usual medium size (I’m usually a medium through and through on most brands, sometimes a small) But this brand I feel runs really small! I had to return these joggers for a large and had to return my medium leggings I got from them too because they were just so tight! Is this just me or has it happened for others as well?
These are my new favorite pants! Lightweight and very comfortable. Casual wear or dress up with a cute shirt and shoe. Buying more!
These are amazingly comfortable. Fit well. Ideal for those spring days when I still need long pants but not heavier weight ones.
I’m 5’8 and about 215 lb and fairly curvy and I wear an XL in basically everything but an XL in these were super tight and too short. Otherwise they seem great, they just don’t have a big enough size

I was looking for something similar to the Vuori joggers (which I own) and these joggers get 5 stars! They fit perfectly, they are soft and look great. I’ll definitely be buying more. Highly recommend. I’m size M, 5’8” and 135 lbs.
I bought these joggers for work, and they are great. I have to do a lot of bending, squatting, and lifting to help patients, and these fit like a dream.

I really love these pants, they are so comfortable and I love the material. They have a really nice inner pocket that's perfect to keep items secure. I really wish they offered a shorter length because I prefer my joggers a little above my ankle, these are more at my ankle. I still like them so much that I ordered a second pair. I agree with another reviewer that said these do not get any pet hair on them at all. Buy them!
Love the color , love the fit . I was not hopeful when i ordered it but was happily surprised !

I ordered the black in XL.  Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because they run small.  I sized up and still a little snug.  They feel really soft and good quality, just like the more expensive joggers.  Will definitely buy another pair.  So comfortable!!!

I ordered just about every pair of Amazon stretchy joggers in search of the best, and these are it by a landslide! Pretty good dupe for the lululemon high wasted joggers. Quality fabric, nice thickness, wash well. I went up a size for a looser fit. I usually need a short size in pants but these worked ok. I hemmed the cuff in half to make them the perfect length. I ordered the black and love the other color options.
Love the fit and color is great.  Would by more
Ordered an extra small and the fit is the right level of snug. I love the the texture and true navy color. Would definitely buy again.  I’m 5’2 ish and around 130lbs.
I love this brand and should have read the description better - they fit snuggly so didn’t work for me as I like my joggers to fit more loosely.

So wish these would be longer.  The fabric was exactly what I was looking for - not too thin and no sounds when walking.  However they were too short.  I’m 5’7” and they stopped above my ankle - I wanted them to land at the ankle so they looked more like pants.  If they came in a longer inseam I’d be the first to buy!
Fits great, light material, easy to move around. I’m 5’2 and fit and the XS worked out good.
I have 4 pairs of these and I love them!
I am petite these are great for us petite girls. True to size. Light weight comfy. I dress them up or down.
💕this is the jogger that flows well for my work.

These are incredible value for price!!  I was not expecting this at all!  They fit beautifully and true to size.  Seem to be excellent quality and fit very nicely so I may have to order another color.  Similar quality and construction to that other brand for a fraction of the price!
So soft, good fit, super cute

Lots of joggers are too tight in the waistband for me.  My belly isnt slim (waist 39") and I don't have a butt (hips are 44" around) and my legs have an athletic build, wearing my usual L.  These were comfortable all day-- never squeezed my belly nor needed adjusting and still are slim enough in the legs to be flattering. These had more length than some others I tried -- a 28" inseam.  The cognac color is as expected.  Pockets are nice.  The fabric is not clingy and I feel professional enough to wear them like scrubs to work at my clinic.

I originally tried the leggings based on a recommendation and when I loved them, I decided to try the joggers. I had to size up to Large; I’m a medium in the leggings. 5’ 8” 155 lbs. The joggers are super comfortable - definitely will buy other colors.

评论概述: Fits and feels more like a legging
评论详情: I love this brands leggings so I was excited to try these joggers.  They have the exact same feel and fabric of the leggings are def a more tighter, form fitting jogger; not quite what i expected.  5'5, 150, athletic, ordered my normal medium and was a little snug.  Size up if you want a more relaxed fit.
Pants are comfortable and stretchy. I’m 5’9” and length fits perfectly.
I ended up returning these.  I did not care for the fabric and the fit was slimmer than what I wanted.  Color was a good saturated black.  The length was fine but overall fit did not work for me.
Wear for every day and exercise.  Easy care

Ordered two pairs of this, one navy one gray. The fabric is a good weight for all but winter wear or super hot days. There are good deep pockets. The waist is a bit tight, but that's due to me being 77. The leg is a bit long for 5'2". I ordered Medium. Weight is 130 sturdy build and trim in hips. Will  alter the length and the waist a bit to make them more comfy for me.

I can’t stop wearing these! They’re super comfortable and flattering. I think they’re more along the lines of athleta dupe than lululemon. I got the pair in black and it can be dressed up or down. Sizing wise, I am 5’4” with wide hips and small waist and got the medium bc I don’t like tightness but I could fit a small. It has a drawstring waist band so helps if needed. It does fit on the slimmer side for legs so not baggy. I would get a size you normally get and be comfortable in.

I ordered a size S(4-6)-Black, and it fits true to size. The material is thick and smooth in texture. It's substantial in weight compared to the casual and  lightweight joggers. The active jogger is more fitted than the casual jogger and the lightweight jogger, as well. This material is very stretchy and hugs in all the right places. If you prefer a less fitted but still stretchy version, I would go for the casual jogger which runs a little bigger. (By the way, I ordered the casual jogger and lightweight jogger in an XS and they both draped very nicely.) I returned the lightweight jogger because I didn't like the feel of the material. I am pleasantly surprised by this brand and will order other colors.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: I love these pants! They are exactly what I was looking for, slimish through the legs and excellent length. I'm 5'3", 146lbs, size 6/8, and I don't have much of a waist (my body is kind of straight and not curvy). These end just below my ankles and are somewhat high rise. I love that the drawstring is stretchy, so I can just pull them off and on while having them still hug my waist. I wear these every day to my job in physical therapy. They pair well with a polo and don't look overly casual. They also wash well, but I haven't put them in the dryer though.
